mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, BOARD_NO, WRITE, NICK_NAME, CATEGORY, TITLE, CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, STATUS, BOARD_LEVEL, REF_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM "ROWNUM", B.BOARD_NO, B.WRITE, M.NICK_NAME, B.CATEGORY, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.BOARD_DATE, B.STATUS, B.BOARD_LEVEL, B.REF_NO FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.WRITE = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_LEVEL = 1 AND B.CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY B.BOARD_DATE DESC)
